item.title: Judge clears way for execution of South Carolina inmate
item.description: A judge in South Carolina has ruled a death row inmate who thinks most laws are unconstitutional is mentally competent and can be executed

item.title: Trump files $15 billion defamation lawsuit against The New York Times
item.description: President Donald Trump has filed a $15 billion defamation lawsuit against The New York Times and four of its journalists
